existing_features.title: Add a configurable website version identifier set to "8" and display it in the UI so the site can be clearly identified as “Version 8 of the website”. The version must be configurable via a build-time environment variable (defaulting to 8 if not set).
Expose the active website version in the document metadata to help operators verify which version is deployed (without changing the public SEO/canonical URL behavior for swiftsportshub.com).
Update deployment documentation to include how to set the website version to 8 (and how to change it later) during deployment.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide/restore website Version 8 (ability to access or roll back to a specific previous version of the website)
